entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers or drizzle. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers this evening then 30 percent chance of drizzle overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Fog patches. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Thursday 27 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of drizzle. High 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of drizzle. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Fog patches. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High 6. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Thursday 27 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low plus 1 except minus 2 inland.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear in the evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Low plus 1 except minus 2 inland. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Thursday 27 April 2023
